name: Successfully create a new user with valid credentials

steps.name: Given I generate a unique test username and password
When I send a POST request to create the user
Then the response status code should be 201
When I send a POST request to generate a token for the user
Then the response status code should be 200 and contain a token
And the user should be retrievable by GET request

fullName: Login API functionality: Successfully create a new user with valid credentials
